def_cn: 盖伊·福克斯之夜（每年11月5日英国的篝火庆祝活动，借以纪念1605年盖伊·福克斯企图炸毁国会大厦的事件，常称作“篝火之夜”）
def_en: In Britain, Guy Fawkes Night is the evening of 5th November, when many people have parties with bonfires and fireworks. It began as a way of remembering the attempt by Guy Fawkes to blow up the Houses of Parliament in 1605. Guy Fawkes Night is often referred to as 'Bonfire Night'.
